participant_1.background:
I felt like I was going to have a heart attack when my coworker yelled at me in front of the whole office.
I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year.
i have a crush on my co worker.
I remember the smell of my grandmother's house.
I have come to terms with my past and am now focused on helping others.

participant_2.background:
My family members are all very supportive of my dreams.
I want to learn how to finish drywall like my dad.
i volunteer at my local animal shelter.
I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by.
i am married and have 2 kids.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm excited to be starting a new chapter in my life.
That's great! What are you excited about?
I'm going to be starting a new job as a volunteer at my local animal shelter.
That's so awesome! I'm a volunteer at my local animal shelter too.
Oh that's awesome! What do you do there?
I mostly walk the dogs and play with the cats. I also help with cleaning and feeding.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm looking forward to helping out.
I'm sure you'll love it! It's a great place to work.
I'm sure it is! I'm really excited to get started.
